title: PRIMO NUTMEG #147: Walter Block
description:
Walter Block is back to discuss his recent piece on tariffs published in the New York Times, Noam Chomsky's response to his question on PRIMO NUTMEG #144, whether "libertarianism" is a left-wing or a right-wing philosophy, the difference between anarcho-capitalism and Ayn Rand's Objectivism, and whether or not anti-trust action can be implemented by the government to liberate markets.

Please support the show for just $1 a month at https://www.patreon.com/primonutmeg
